title: Paradisul Verde
description: Little health food shop in the Old Town. Stocks rice, oat milk, soy milk, faux meat, snacks, tofu, and more. Directions: Strada Sf Ioan is between Strada Republicii (main shopping street) and Strada Muresenilor; the shop's at the Muresenilor end. Other locations in Galeria Real Brasov and Carefour Brasov.
